attributes.action: force the British Olympic Committee to reverse their decision on banning the Red Arrows from performing at the opening ceremony of the 2012 Olympics. The Red Arrows perform world wide and are the perfect ambassadors for our country and do not offend anyone. The decision to ban them is an insult, not only to the Red Arrows but to all British people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
